definitions.definition: to obtain, buy, or earn something:
examples: He went to the shop to get some milk.

definitions.definition: to receive or be given something:
examples: UK I got quite a surprise when I saw her with short hair.

definitions.definition: to go somewhere and bring back someone or something:
examples: Let me go get my glasses.

definitions.definition: to take someone or something into your possession by force:
examples: Have the police got the man who did it yet?
